faq.sectionDescription: Everything you need to know about Easy EPU

items.question: Who can use Easy EPU?
items.answer: Easy EPU is exclusively available for students and staff with an official EPU email address.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely! We use industry-standard encryption to ensure your academic data remains private and secure.

items.question: Do I need to download anything?
items.answer: No downloads required. Easy EPU is a web-based platform that works on any device with an internet connection.

items.question: How do I get support if I have issues?
items.answer: Our support team is available 24/7. Just click on the help icon in the bottom right corner of your dashboard.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Cookie Policy explains how Easy EPU uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our platform. It explains what these technologies are and why we use them, as well as your rights to control our use of them.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content1: Cookies are small data files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. Cookies are widely used by website owners to make their websites work, or to work more efficiently, as well as to provide reporting information.
whatAreCookies.content2: Cookies set by Easy EPU are called "first-party cookies". Cookies set by parties other than the website owner are called "third-party cookies". Third-party cookies enable third-party features or functionality to be provided on or through the website (e.g., advertising, interactive content and analytics).

whyUseCookies.title: Why Do We Use Cookies?
whyUseCookies.intro: We use first-party and third-party cookies for several reasons:

types.essential: Essential Cookies: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be switched off in our systems.
types.performance: Performance Cookies: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site.
types.functional: Functional Cookies: These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization.
types.analytics: Analytics Cookies: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

control.title: How to Control Cookies
control.content1: You can control and manage cookies in various ways. Please keep in mind that removing or blocking cookies can negatively impact your user experience and parts of our website may no longer be fully accessible.
control.content2: Most browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can choose to accept or decline cookies through your browser controls. For more information on how to manage cookies, please visit your browser's help function.

changes.title: Changes to This Cookie Policy
changes.content: We may update our Cookie Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Cookie Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.
